choices: A new curse has been Unleashed?
1.title: The story

choices: Talking about how they like their new place
111.content:
One day in a woods far away, there was a guardian protecting a gate that have thorns are wrapped around. Big Bang Flash in a instantly the gate was open.

Guard: (moans) (gasps) Oh, no oh, no! He got out! I better tell somebody about this.

He ran off but he didn't know. The thing didn't even leave the thing step out. Saw the sun and flew away.

Trickster: I think I should make a party in this world. Ha ha ha.

Later in human world Bloom and the other had now a headquarters of their own. And making themself at home.

What happens next?
111.title: A trickster

info.description:
The rules-

Rule #1: No death, No gore, No inappropriate things.

Rule #2: Crossover is allowed.

Rule #3: You can added new characters in the story even if is yourself.
